Class Server

java.lang.Object

public class Server extends Object
This class represents the server.

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server(int port)

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Boot the server. If any error occur during the booting phase (e.g. config file not found, ecc.) the server is shutdown and a message is shown.

    • addClient

      public void addClient(String nickname, SocketConnection socketConnection)
      When a client join it is added to the LobbyManager
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the new client
      socketConnection - to be added

    • addMatch

      public void addMatch(List<String> names, GameController controller)
      When a match start it is added to the map so that when a message from a client arrives the server knows who had to handle that packet.
      Parameters:
      names - the list of player in the game
      controller - the controller of that game

    • receiveMessage

      public void receiveMessage(Notification msg)
      Receive a notification from a client. If the sender is in the lobby it is sent to the lobby, otherwise the controller has to handle it
      Parameters:
      msg - the notification to receive

    • handleDisconnection

      public void handleDisconnection(Socket client)
      When a disconnection occurs the server distinguish if the client is in the lobby or in a match. The disconnection is handled in different way. In fact, if the client is in a game, all the players in game are notified and the game ends. Otherwise, if the client is in the lobby the disconnection is handled in a different way.
      Parameters:
      client - the socket that close the connection
